title: BR/US University Hubs!
description: Community hubs need backing from communities. We legitimize the need for blockchain hubs by addressing a problem well-known to city leaders.
solution: Create 'University Community Hubs' in Brazil/US that deepen relationships between colleges and cities as innovation hubs.
experience: Plutus pioneer, experienced Catalyst members, Veteran Community Advisor, educational background, backed by Gimbalabs and Catalyst School.
